website_summaries.verdict: A basic timing light that has a tachometer that you can read as you adjust your timing.
pros: Easy to switch between 2- and 4-cycle engines
cons: The light on this could be brighter
While it works well in the garage, it can be difficult to see in the sun

customer_reviews.title: A stupidly convenient tool I’ll never be without again.
customer_reviews.text: I mechanic all our vehicles on the ranch. Always have. I swap batteries all the time between our transport vehicles and play vehicles etc. Never had one of these so I always end up resetting radios. Engine parameters. Clocks. Go figure. This worked like a champ and the latest battery swap took me 10 minutes or so disconnected while I cleaned up the battery area etc. All my functions stayed just as I’d set them. I call that a big win.
customer_reviews.author: Taggert

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: DO. NOT. BUY. I've tried two with bad results. Neither timing light flashed- light can be seen "on" when looking into device, directly, but does not flash. I've invested $40 trying to troubleshoot this device(batteries) resulting in me receiving a refund. Now, I have to spend my time and gas to ship back this defective product, to then be repackaged, and sold to the next sucker, all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not really effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this to save radio/computer/electronics settings during a battery swap in my car. I was very disappointed as the clock lost all the time that the battery was off-line and the trip meter was reset to zero. I have another battery swap coming up on a newer car with more electronics so will find another alternative. I have had it suggested that a starter jump pack is better.
customer_reviews.author: John M Burley

customer_reviews.title: I used this to start an RV with a check ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this to start an RV with a check engine light on. If you know why the light is on and have gotten into a "no start" situation, you can turn the key to "on" and start the vehicle with this tool. It will bypass the "computer" that is preventing you from using the key to start the vehicle. You must make sure you know what is causing the no start condition however to make sure you don't damage the motor. This process will allow you to drive the vehicle to get it serviced.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hasbro

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I was able to save all my programs, preset etc. wasn't sure a 9volt would be sufficient with modern energy hungry computer system, so I minimized time without a battery and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you know what you buy
customer_reviews.text: In stalled 2 brand new D cell batteries. The test light on the timing light indicated the batteries were good! Followed all the directions and even tried using it in my darkened garage and the timing light was so weak you couldn't read timing marks on the engine. A waste of money here.
customer_reviews.author: PapaSam

customer_reviews.title: Works for me.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work for me, just make sure you have a always powered on outlet, or you will need to leave the key on (and may run the 9v battery down faster).
customer_reviews.author: Nalon1

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I have two generators and a riding mower, and have had to check spark plugs when any of them stopped working. This makes testing spark plugs easy and keeps you from having to buy a new plug if the plug is not the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Trevoc

customer_reviews.title: It Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I do not use this often, but when needed it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Alligator clips are horrible.  Trying to clip onto a 5/16" solenoid bolt and the clip came apart.
customer_reviews.text: Looked like a better than average version among the more inexpensive of the remote starters. The hand switch and wire gauge is a bit better than most, but as I stated the alligator clips are total garbage. It's a shame, otherwise would be a great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Pro quality for any garage
customer_reviews.text: Took a long break stuck in commute traffic in a Camry What a stress reliever back to working on old Chevy’s, checking for spark,burnt coil ,rewire grounds to body,motor, battery. Great remote starter ,heavy leads,pro quality for my garage work,finally getting time to wrench again ,the wife likes 54 Chevy hard tops,if I known sooner what car I should brought home.
customer_reviews.author: Jcgard

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Battery must have a charge before you use it, if your car battery is already dead it's a lost cause. But this item works as described!
customer_reviews.author: Scoutmaster MG (SMG)

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tool heavy duty this is everything I paid for and then some I did not expect to get this kind of quality my father has a Snap-On brand tool like this he's had it for years and years and that's what I was going to get well I'm glad I didn't this is better quality it's less than 3rd of the price
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: All lights on
customer_reviews.text: I was having problem with my car charging system and I bought this item hopping that will tell me if the Alternator was charging at different load conditions. But all the LEDs were on all the time, making the device useless. I called Amazon to return the device and get my refund Mario
customer_reviews.author: Maluco1969

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier. Grip is for man hands and the button makes you feel like you’re about to start a 4000hp funny car engine. Cables are long enough in case you don’t trust your mechanical skills to start up that engine you just built. And as for the clamping power... Do not, i repeat, DO NOT attach these space age clamping devices to your nipples!. Very pleased with the overall design and function!
customer_reviews.author: Mdl166

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Used it while I replaced the battery on my truck and I didn't have to reprogram anything.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Zimmermann

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a timing light but the light is pretty dim so it's almost useless in broad daylight. It work best inside a show. But if you were in a shop I guess you wouldn't need a portable timing light.
customer_reviews.author: stick

customer_reviews.title: easy too use
customer_reviews.text: man what a great addition too my tool box .Lets you crank everything without helper needed too start engine
customer_reviews.author: cool breezeAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work on a 2001 BMW X5, loss in a couple hours
customer_reviews.text: I've used this several times, and it doesn't seem to work long enough to save the settings in an older X5. Maybe I'm not working fast enough, but the 9 volt drains before I can complete my task.
customer_reviews.author: Dan B

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty handy to not have to hook the light to the car's battery. Works well. It is clearly not a tool you want to throw around because it is just plastic but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: RemcoW

customer_reviews.title: Poor Tool Performance
customer_reviews.text: Shank not long enough to allow plug-in for our Buick LeSabre! On another car, all the lights illuminate when plugged in - that makes the "info" useless. It went in the garbage as a waste of a little $$.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Red lamp to indicate when circuit connected. Have used multiple times with no issues. Protective covers for clamps to protect against short. Clamps stay secured
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Spark light could be a little brighter. Used to troubleshoot DIM small engine repair. Does function as discribed. B
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I like how fast and easy this tool is to use BUT remember to turn everything off in the car and turn the key to the on position so the 9 volt battery can power what is needed. Watch your time because the 9 volt battery will not last all day, I suggest reading the instructions and good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works. Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough for what I need it for. It is larger than I imagined it being. Light is dim as others have said, but identifies the timing mark accurately. Cuts out over 6,000 rpm on my 2 stroke, not very important that it could go further, just was watching the ignition curve.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cain

customer_reviews.title: Ok after a little modifying
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I hooked the second wire on ,my engine tried to turn over. I took it apart to find out that the two wires that go inside the rubber handle were touching each other , had to unscrew and grind a little on the sides for clearance after that it worked fine ! But if you have to what I did watch out for them little wires that go to a red light on the face..you might rip one
customer_reviews.author: Rudy F.

customer_reviews.title: Poor workmanship and quality control.
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I went to use the remote start. As soon as I hooked up the remote. The engine started to crank. I disassemble the remote and found both wire connectors touching together. It was assembled this way. Needless to say poor workmanship and lack of quality control. I was able to repair and it works now. Would definitely check it out as soon as you receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Orndorff

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This is much more heavy duty than I expected! The little pilot light is handy and assures you of a connection. Heavy cables, beefy handle, strong feel to the button. Worked great for me (1970 Plymouth Duster). Still surprised at how nice it is. I think I will have this for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great tester to have
customer_reviews.text: Makes testing my coil and spark plug wire easier on my 1998 TJ.
customer_reviews.author: Guess

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: best way to keep your cars radios memory when you do electrical work on your car or truck

customer_reviews.title: It works better than a screwdriver+sparks !
customer_reviews.text: I modified it to include a 20A in line fuse available on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: arrived as advertised
customer_reviews.text: product works well. used to keep computer active when changing a vehicles battery

customer_reviews.text: Connected the battery, inserted into cigarette lighter. Performed required vehicle maintenance. Afterwards none of the radio presets were retained.

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I was able to start my car with all of the ignition issues and helped me to find the problems and fix them.

customer_reviews.title: Received in good condition, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: These electric device be highly important as removing automobile batteries in electronic fuel injection vehicles often looses the saved data in the computers which control aspects of electronic fuel injection, preset radio memory, or other luxury accessories.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good

The only complaint I have it the light on the top doesn’t work, but if you know what you’re doing and connect it right it doesn’t really matter 🤷🏻‍♂️

customer_reviews.title: Missing nut on top and light doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Since the nut on top is missing, the top washer/cap falls off every time you use it and the light doesn't work. Still works but aggravating. I would not recommend it to anyone.

product_meta.title: Performance Tool W80587 Digital Advance Timing Light, 1 Pack
product_meta.description: Size:Digital Advance Timing LightProfessional set initial and advance timing to obtain total timing and peak performance.. Super bright xenon flash, and a high Vis LED display Designed for precise tuning and diagnostic work. Display engine speed up to 9,000 RPM, and ignition spark advance from 0-90. Pushbutton control to adjust advance and switch between 4 and 2 cycle engines. Tough ABS shell, 60 in. inductive pickup leads and works with 12 volt systems.
feature_bullets: Display engine speed up to 9, 000 RPM, and ignition spark advance from 0-90
Professional set initial and advance timing to obtain total timing and peak performance
Super bright Xenon flash, and a high vis LED display
Designed for precise tuning and diagnostic work. Tough ABS shell, 60 in. Inductive Pickup leads and works with 12 volt systems
Pushbutton control to adjust advance and switch between 4 and 2 cycle engines

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars526 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
